last_episode_to_air.name: Soul Mates
last_episode_to_air.overview: On the day of her wedding Sabrina is still trying to find whether her groom or Harvey is her real soul-mate.

name: Sabrina, the Teenage Witch
overview: On her sixteenth birthday, Sabrina Spellman discovers she has magical powers. She lives with her 600-year-old aunts Hilda and Zelda as well as talking cat Salem in the fictional town of Westbridge, Massachusetts.

episodes.name: Pilot
episodes.overview: On her sixteenth birthday, Sabrina Spellman finds out that she is a witch. However, instead of helping her, it actually makes life more difficult, especially after she gets on the wrong side of head cheerleader, Libby.

episodes.name: Bundt Friday
episodes.overview: Sabrina slips Libby some truth sprinkles to make her confess to spreading nasty lies, but her plan backfires when the goodies make Jenny reveal she's sweet on Sabrina's love interest, Harvey. Meanwhile, Hilda prepares for a date with Drell - despite his having stood her up over 1,000 times in the past.

episodes.name: The True Adventures of Rudy Kazootie
episodes.overview: In an attempt at earning some money to buy roller blades, Sabrina takes a job babysitting a little boy. However, when she is trying to calm him down, she inadvertently casts a spell which turns him into a man.

episodes.name: Terrible Things
episodes.overview: Sabrina discovers that some of her closest friends have their own respective wishes, and she attempts to have all three of their desires granted.

episodes.name: A Halloween Story
episodes.overview: Sabrina faces a frightful dilemma when she must be in two places at once for Halloween.

episodes.name: Dream Date
episodes.overview: When Sabrina is left feeling down because Harvey has agreed to go to the school dance with Libby, her aunts literally cook up a date for her, but nonetheless she still pines for him.

episodes.name: Third Aunt From the Sun
episodes.overview: Sabrina's zany Aunt Vesta pays her a visit and soon hatches a plot to entice her niece into moving to the Other Realm.

episodes.name: Magic Joel
episodes.overview: In an effort to get Harvey's attention, Sabrina takes a job as a magician's assistant, but things go awry when she inadvertently makes the magician disappear.

episodes.name: Geek Like Me
episodes.overview: Popular Libby manages to turn being a geek into a position of power.

episodes.name: Sweet and Sour Victory
episodes.overview: Depressed by her lack of talent at sports, Sabrina casts a spell which makes her brilliant at Kung Fu, but when she beats a seasoned professional, her conscience bothers her.

episodes.name: A Girl and Her Cat
episodes.overview: A Christmas Eve catnapping renews Salem's love for his family.

episodes.name: Trial by Fury
episodes.overview: Sabrina and her aunts use magic to show an unfair teacher that what goes around comes around.

episodes.name: Jenny's Non-Dream
episodes.overview: After spending the weekend at Jenny's, under the advice of her aunts, Sabrina reluctantly invites Jenny to her house. However, when Jenny enters the linen closet, she ends up in the Other Realm, at the mercy of Drell.

episodes.name: Sabrina Through the Looking Glass
episodes.overview: Sabrina's in a foul mood and only baseball great Brady Anderson can help her out of her slump.

episodes.name: Hilda and Zelda: the Teenage Years
episodes.overview: Aunts Hilda and Zelda experience growing pains when they turn into teenagers for the night.

episodes.name: Mars Attracts
episodes.overview: Sabrina and her aunts take a trip to Mars, but Sabrina is reluctant to leave Harvey. She agrees to call him at a specified time, but when her attractive ski instructor takes a shine to her, she soon forgets about the mortal world.

episodes.name: First Kiss
episodes.overview: As Sabrina and Harvey grow closer, her aunts reveal that when a witch kisses a mortal for the first time, the mortal turns into a frog. Unable to stop herself, however, Sabrina kisses Harvey, and must find a way to change him back.

episodes.name: Sweet Charity
episodes.overview: When Sabrina uses Libby's likeness to promote a community service program, the real Libby manages to steal the limelight.

episodes.name: Cat Showdown
episodes.overview: Salem enters a cat show to make some fast cash, but Sabrina uncovers a fur-raising scandal.

episodes.name: Meeting Dad's Girlfriend
episodes.overview: Love definitely isn't in the air when Sabrina meets her dad's new girlfriend.

episodes.name: As Westbridge Turns
episodes.overview: Sinister plots, tumultuous romance, danger, and intrigue - just another day at Westbridge High, after Sabrina casts a spell wishing for more excitement.

episodes.name: The Great Mistake
episodes.overview: Sabrina finds herself in a "little" trouble when she sneaks out of the house after being grounded.

episodes.name: The Crucible
episodes.overview: Sabrina is put on trial for witchcraft when her class visits historical Salem, Massachusetts.

episodes.name: Troll Bride
episodes.overview: When Sabrina is tricked into marrying a troll, only a prince - a.k.a. Harvey - can save her.

episodes.name: Sabrina Gets Her License (1)
episodes.overview: All of Sabrina's responsibilities as student, girlfriend and witch pile up on her as she fails her witch's exam and ends up at witch boot camp.

episodes.name: Sabrina Gets Her License (2)
episodes.overview: Sabrina plans to escape from boot camp to be with Harvey.

episodes.name: Dummy for Love
episodes.overview: Sabrina takes advantage of Vice Principal Kraft's attraction to Aunt Hilda.

episodes.name: Dante's Inferno
episodes.overview: Sabrina learns not to date outside of her realm after a bad evening with a witch boy.

episodes.name: A Doll's Story
episodes.overview: Babysitting becomes a test of ingenuity when Sabrina's bratty little cousin turns her into a doll.

episodes.name: Sabrina, the Teenage Boy
episodes.overview: Sabrina can't understand boys and when she senses something between Harvey and Valerie, she turns herself into a boy but ends up dating Libby. Hilda also transforms into a man to try and get rid of Mr Kraft.

episodes.name: A River of Candy Corn Runs Through It
episodes.overview: Valerie announces an unplanned Halloween party at Sabrina's who decides to whip one up and has to deal with her aunts' talking furniture.

episodes.name: Inna-Gadda-Sabrina
episodes.overview: After Salem swallows a time-ball Sabrina's entire existence swirls back to the 1960's.

episodes.name: Witch Trash
episodes.overview: After Sabrina's country cousins express their anger over Sabrina getting the family spell book, they magically lock the Spellmans and their guests in the house.

episodes.name: To Tell a Mortal
episodes.overview: On Friday the 13th a witch can tell a mortal about being a witch because at the end of the day they will forget about their secret so Sabrina tells Valerie and Harvey.

episodes.name: Oh What a Tangled Spell She Weaves
episodes.overview: Sabrina must learn that spells worded too generally affect her entire world. She also sends Salem and her Aunts to Merlin's castle.

episodes.name: Sabrina Claus
episodes.overview: Sabrina meets the real Santa Claus named 'Bob' and has to fill in for him when he is injured.

episodes.name: Little Big Kraft
episodes.overview: Sabrina turns Mr. Kraft into an obnoxious and irresponsible teenager and almost ruins the high school ski trip.

episodes.name: Five Easy Pieces of Libby
episodes.overview: While working on a float with Libby, Sabrina casts a spell that keeps her away from Sabrina. The spell is reversed and they have to spend time together. Finally Libby turns into a puzzle that Sabrina has to solve.

episodes.name: Finger Lickin' Flu
episodes.overview: Sabrina's magic accidentally gets transfered to Mrs. Quick who turns Mr. Kraft into a chimp.

episodes.name: Sabrina and the Beanstalk
episodes.overview: Sabrina accidentally whips up a giant beanstalk and Harvey ends up on top of it being fattened up by a hungry witch.

episodes.name: The Equalizer
episodes.overview: Roland the Troll is a magic policeman and steals Sabrina's heart after she misuses magic.

episodes.name: The Band Episode
episodes.overview: Some bottled talent drinks make Sabrina's band (Harvey and Valerie) very hot, but also ruins their friendships.

episodes.name: When Teens Collide
episodes.overview: Sunspots cause havoc with witches as Sabrina and Libby change personalities which Salem takes advantage of.

episodes.name: My Nightmare, the Car
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Valerie share a car that Sabrina gets from the Other Realm that talks and prefers Sabrina.

episodes.name: Fear Strikes Up a Conversation
episodes.overview: Sabrina erases her fears before reading an essay in front of a school assembly and her fears stalk the the school halls causing everyone to be afraid of the smallest things.

episodes.name: Quiz Show
episodes.overview: When Sabrina complains about her Quizmaster he gets reassigned just before Sabrina's hardest test.

episodes.name: Disneyworld
episodes.overview: On a field trip to Disney's Animal Kingdom in Florida, Sabrina, working to pass a critical test for her witch's license, accidentally turns Libby and Valerie into zebras.

episodes.name: Sabrina's Choice
episodes.overview: When Sabrina plays one aunt against the other they decide to setup separate households and Sabrina has to decide between them.

episodes.name: Rumor Mill
episodes.overview: In order to get her witch's license, Sabrina must complete community service in the Other Realm. She gets a job at the rumor mill, a place where rumors are started, and meets a guy named Dashiell.

episodes.name: Mom vs. Magic
episodes.overview: Sabrina's plan to balance seeing both Harvey and Dashiell is disrupted when they meet each other by chance. They ask her to choose between them, while a hasty act leads to her being forced to make an even bigger decision.

episodes.name: It's A Mad Mad Mad Mad Season Opener
episodes.overview: As Sabrina continues to avoid choosing between Harvey and Dashiell, the pair give her an ultimatum: choose one of them, or neither will stay with her. Meanwhile, her aunts inform that she is finally to receive her witch's license.

episodes.name: Boy Was My Face Red
episodes.overview: To ease Valerie's embarrassment Sabrina casts a spell which helps Valerie, but the spell turns her face red.

episodes.name: Suspicious Minds
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets jealous when Mr. Kraft's assignment calls for the students to pair up and pretend to be married and Libby makes sure that Harvey is her partner.

episodes.name: The Pom Pom Incident
episodes.overview: Trouble brews between best friends when Valerie becomes eager to try out for cheerleading, even though Sabrina can't stand the squad's pom-pompous participants.

episodes.name: Pancake Madness
episodes.overview: Sabrina makes a glutton of herself at school after tasting a substance that causes hopeless addiction in her family: pancakes.

episodes.name: Good Will Haunting
episodes.overview: A thoroughly ridiculous Halloween episode finds Aunts Hilda and Zelda having run out excuses (after 500 consecutive years) not to attend their Aunt Beulah's Halloween party.

guest_stars.character: Guy Who Thinks He's Gary Owens
guest_stars.name: Gary Owens

episodes.name: You Bet Your Family
episodes.overview: Salem loses Sabrina and her aunts in a card game against a high roller.

episodes.name: And the Sabrina Goes To...
episodes.overview: When no one acknowledges her achievements Sabrina casts a spell and ends upon her own awards show.

episodes.name: Nobody Nose Libby Like Sabrina Nose Libby
episodes.overview: Rivalry between Libby and Sabrina moves onto a whole new scale in this parody of the '60s science fiction film Fantastic Voyage.

episodes.name: Sabrina and the Beast
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Harvey decide to compete against Libby and her boyfriend for the title of cutest teen couple.

episodes.name: Christmas Amnesia
episodes.overview: It's Sabrina the Grinch, increasingly grumpy in the face of her aunts' unflagging efforts to get her into the holiday spirit.

episodes.name: Whose So-Called Life Is It Anyway?
episodes.overview: Sabrina gives Valerie's family a wishbone wish despite warnings from the Witches Council.

episodes.name: What Price Harvey?
episodes.overview: Hilda and Zelda's zany cousin convinces the sisters to switch personalities, and gives Sabrina a cologne to use on Harvey in order to make him more ambitious.

episodes.name: Mrs. Kraft
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Hilda are disturbed, not to say grossed out, by the growing intimacy between Zelda and Mr. Kraft.

episodes.name: Sabrina and the Pirates
episodes.overview: Sabrina's aunts send in their magic for its annual overhaul, but when it is sent back, it ends up in the hands of three pirate prisoners they forgot to release years before, and Sabrina, also without magic due to a mishap, must save them.

episodes.name: Sabrina the Matchmaker
episodes.overview: Cupid threatens to banish Sabrina to the Other Realm unless she manages to bring a couple together for Valentine's Day.

episodes.name: Salem, the Boy
episodes.overview: Roland the Troll resurfaces in a new guise as a leprechaun, and chaos predictably follows. Having three wishes, Sabrina unwisely uses one of them to grant Salem's desire to be human again for a day.

episodes.name: Sabrina, the Teenage Writer
episodes.overview: Sabrina's creative writing assignments aren't going well until she accidentally uses Hilda's magic typewriter to plot out a James Bond parody using her friends and foes as character models.

episodes.name: The Big Sleep
episodes.overview: Sabrina wakes up Aunt Dorma from her hibernation who is unhappy and sends the Spellmans a house full of sleep inducing poppies.

episodes.name: Sabrina's Pen Pal
episodes.overview: Sabrina's painfully shy pen pal turns out to be an Other Realm jewel thief in disguise.

episodes.name: Sabrina's Real World
episodes.overview: The Witch Channel broadcasts Sabrina's life on national television; Hilda turns into a compulsive standup comedienne.

episodes.name: The Long and Winding Short Cut
episodes.overview: After accepting help from an outside, Sabrina is banished to the Other Realm's Wild West badlands.

episodes.name: Sabrina the Sandman
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets a job as a sleep-inducing sandman but changes her subjects' lives by altering their dreams.

episodes.name: Silent Movie
episodes.overview: Harvey tells Sabrina he loves her, but under a self-imposed "silence" spell, she can't respond in kind and Aunt Zelda anxiously awaits a marriage proposal from Mr. Kraft.

episodes.name: The Good, the Bad and the Luau
episodes.overview: Sabrina and her aunts travel to Hawaii for a family reunion, but when they arrive, Sabrina discovers that she will not be able to enjoy herself until she solves the family secret once and for all.

episodes.name: No Place Like Home
episodes.overview: Sabrina goes to live with her father in Paris.

episodes.name: Dream a Little Dreama Me
episodes.overview: Sabrina learns that she has been instructed to mentor a witch student, and it turns out that her student is the new girl at school, Dreama. However, Dreama's clumsy spells arouse Harvey's friend Brad's suspicions, revealing his true nature.

episodes.name: Jealousy
episodes.overview: Sabrina turns green with envy, literally, after Harvey and Brad become best friends, triggering a case of Jealotosis - an intense green-eyed witch envy - when Harvey teams up with Brad instead of her to write an article for the school paper.

episodes.name: Little Orphan Hilda
episodes.overview: Sabrina invites her fussy grandmother Lydia to visit, but the family gathering is not a success.

episodes.name: Spoiled Rotten
episodes.overview: Credit-card carrier Sabrina catches get-itis and begins to spoil herself...literally, and tries to cure it by donating magic mementos to a yard sale.

episodes.name: Episode LXXXI: The Phantom Menace
episodes.overview: It's Halloween, and Sabrina is having a ghoulish time adjusting to her new job at the coffee house.

episodes.name: Prelude to a Kiss
episodes.overview: Sabrina enlists Dreama to zap her into two places at once after she agrees to help Josh study on the night of Harvey's big football game.

episodes.name: Aging, Not So Gracefully
episodes.overview: Sabrina zaps on a skin cream to appear more mature after college-guy Josh shoots down a romance because of her age, but the fast-acting lotion ends up being a rapid-aging potion.

episodes.name: Love Means Having to Say You're Sorry
episodes.overview: Consumed with guilt over kissing Josh, Sabrina runs herself ragged trying to cook up a way to get Harvey to forgive her without having to say she's sorry.

episodes.name: Ice Station Sabrina
episodes.overview: Sabrina is unable to use magic to save the day after uninvited witch-hunter Brad joins her and Harvey on a doomed ski trip.

episodes.name: Salem and Juliette
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Mrs. Quick uncover a scandal at school involving Mr. Kraft and misappropriated funds. Meanwhile, Sabrina finds Salem a date for his high school reunion, but it seems he is much more interested in her than she is in him.

episodes.name: Sabrina, Nipping at Your Nose
episodes.overview: A Jamaica-bound Sabrina must spend the holidays with Mr. Kraft after she fools with Mother Nature and her snowy forecast.

episodes.name: Now You See Her, Now You Don't
episodes.overview: Trying to lose weight to fit into a dress, Sabrina's Other Realm remedy makes her disappear.

episodes.name: Super Hero
episodes.overview: Sabrina's sloppy spell casting turns Harvey into his childhood superhero idol, while Kraft quits school to become a world famous aviator.

episodes.name: Love in Bloom
episodes.overview: Valentine's Day magic has Sabrina rushing to put an end to Josh's secret crush on her before she breaks Harvey's heart.

episodes.name: Welcome Back, Duke
episodes.overview: Salem's war-criminal buddy Duke visits after completing his sentence as a cat, and finds his powers have grown a little hairy.

episodes.name: Salem's Daughter
episodes.overview: Salem is heartbroken to receive a wedding announcement from his estranged daughter Annabele, who hasn't spoken to him in decades.

episodes.name: Dreama the Mouse
episodes.overview: Sabrina has to fight a bad case of spring fever and deal with Dreama who has been turned into a mouse.

episodes.name: The Wild, Wild Witch
episodes.overview: When upset with all the rules in her life, Sabrina is sent to an old west town that has no rules.

episodes.name: She's Baaaack!
episodes.overview: Sabrina's bratty cousin Amanda shows up with plans to steal one of Sabrina's men.

episodes.name: The Four Faces of Sabrina
episodes.overview: When Sabrina is accepted to different colleges, she is pressured by Josh, Harvey and Zelda to choose their favorite, but her indecisiveness and need to please everyone causes her to be torn apart -- literally into four different Sabrinas.

episodes.name: The End of an Era
episodes.overview: Josh and Harvey are both fighting over Sabrina and they have to take a magical test.

episodes.name: Every Witch Way but Loose
episodes.overview: Sabrina goes to college and moves into an old house with roomies Roxie, Morgan and Miles. She finds out she can't live a completely normal life as a witch.

episodes.name: Double Time
episodes.overview: Sabrina casts a spell to speed herself up. Zelda takes a position as a prof at the college.

episodes.name: Heart of the Matter
episodes.overview: Hilda takes over the coffee shop while Sabrina casts a spell so she'll say yes to everyone who asks her out after turning down too many dates.

episodes.name: You Can't Twin
episodes.overview: Sabrina runs into Katrina who steals her Other Realm passport and goes to the mortal world to wreck her life.

episodes.name: House of Pi's
episodes.overview: Sabrina goes undercover at Morgan's sorority to land a newspaper reporter slot, but has second thoughts.

episodes.name: The Halloween Scene
episodes.overview: Sabrina has a Halloween party at her old place and ends up counseling Frankenstein and his bride.

episodes.name: Welcome, Traveler
episodes.overview: Sabrina insists that Miles get more social and he ends up in a cult where its leader claims to be a witch. Sabrina looks into it.

episodes.name: Some of My Best Friends are Half-Mortals
episodes.overview: Zelda fixes Sabrina up with a male witch which is fine until she comes up against prejudice because she is half mortal.

episodes.name: Lost at 'C'
episodes.overview: Sabrina is totally devastated when she receives her first C and then Zelda takes up with the same professor.

episodes.name: Sabrina's Perfect Christmas
episodes.overview: Spending Christmas with Morgan's family is not as perfect as it seems.

episodes.name: My Best Shot
episodes.overview: Giving Josh a confidence boost makes him quit his job at the coffee shop.

episodes.name: Tick-Tock Hilda's Clock
episodes.overview: A visit from old friends who are now parents sets Hilda's very literal biological clock running at an alarming speed.

episodes.name: Sabrina's New Roommate
episodes.overview: When Sabrina reluctantly takes in Zelda for a few days while Hilda's on a home remodeling binge, Sabrina and her roommates try to loosen up the tightly wound Zelda.

episodes.name: Making the Grade
episodes.overview: Sabrina tries to right a wrong when she writes an article for the school paper exposing the preferential treatment given to school athletes.

episodes.name: Love Is A Many Complicated Thing
episodes.overview: While on a Valentine's Day double date, Josh surprises Sabrina by telling her he's breaking up with Morgan, who's oblivious to the fact.

episodes.name: Sabrina, The Muse
episodes.overview: Sabrina is flattered when her new boyfriend writes music about his feelings for her, but the pressure to inspire as his muse becomes a one-sided relationship.

episodes.name: Beach Blanket Bizarro
episodes.overview: Sabrina's wild vision of her first college spring break turn squeaky-clean when her aunts ask '60s teen idol Frankie Avalon to put a spell on the trip that sets Sabrina and her friends in a world straight out of a '60s beach movie.

episodes.name: Witchright Hall
episodes.overview: Sabrina's cousin Amanda is sent to live a year in the mortal realm at a school for maladjusted witches.

episodes.name: Sabrina, the Activist
episodes.overview: Saving a historical building becomes Sabrina's new cause as she becomes closer with Josh.

episodes.name: Do You See What I See?
episodes.overview: Paranormal-studies major Miles spots a flying car and gives a class presentation on it, but the students are less than thrilled with his UFO sighting.

episodes.name: Sabrina's Got Spirit
episodes.overview: Miles brings a paranormal-energy detector into the house so that he can identify spirits, and it goes berserk near Sabrina.

episodes.name: Finally!
episodes.overview: Josh and Sabrina host a singles night at the coffee house and get into an argument after his friend stands up Roxie.

episodes.name: Really Big Season Opener
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Miles decide to produce a horror picture and some of the actors may be real monsters.

episodes.name: Sabrina's Date with Destiny
episodes.overview: Josh returns from his summer in Prague and says that he's taking a job overseas.

episodes.name: What's News
episodes.overview: Josh's newspaper job is taking all of his time away from Sabrina and she finds out that Morgan is dating Harvey.

episodes.name: Murder on the Halloween Express
episodes.overview: Sabrina takes a holiday idea from Salem and brings her friends on the spooky Mystery Train for a Halloween adventure. There's just one problem: It's in the Other Realm. Sabrina soon learns that the mortals can leave only if she solves the puzzling mystery when she goes back into something out of a 1920 mystery movie.

episodes.name: The Gift of Gab
episodes.overview: Sabrina and Roxie get their own call in college radio show. Sabrina is tongue tied while Roxie takes right to it. Sabrina then bows out and lets Roxie have the show.

episodes.name: Thin Ice
episodes.overview: When Harvey needs help on the Boston College hockey team, she gets him skates from the god Mercury.

episodes.name: Hex, Lies & No Videotape
episodes.overview: Josh gets Sabrina a job at the newspaper, but she wants to keep their relationship a secret so people don't think she got the job as the photographer's girlfriend.

episodes.name: Humble Pie
episodes.overview: After Morgan spends all her money, borrows from her roommates and then gets cut off by her parents, Sabrina gives her a taste of magical humble pie.

episodes.name: A Birthday Witch
episodes.overview: Great-aunt Irma comes to test Harvey's trustworthiness when she learns that he knows that Sabrina is a witch.

episodes.name: Deliver Us from E-mail
episodes.overview: Katrina gives Sabrina a virus that turns her into an airhead. She also wants to start her own column in the paper.

episodes.name: Cloud Ten
episodes.overview: Rejection on a garbage strike story sends Sabrina to the Other Realm for a trip to Cloud 10.

episodes.name: Sabrina and the Candidate
episodes.overview: Sabrina is wrong in her expose on a shady politician.

episodes.name: I Think I Love You
episodes.overview: When Sabrina tries to say "I Love You" after Josh professes his love, it comes out in a funny voice. The Love Doctor says that she has to tell him that she is a witch.

episodes.name: The Arrangement
episodes.overview: Great-aunt Irma shows up with a witch named Peter that Sabrina is supposed to marry immediately. Peter doesn't want to get married and falls for Roxie.

episodes.name: Time After Time
episodes.overview: Sabrina uses magic to erase Zelda's broken heart, but the change in history erases Sabrina.

episodes.name: Sabrina and the Kiss
episodes.overview: Sabrina kisses an old boyfriend and Josh says that he doesn't mind, but Sabrina wonders.

episodes.name: The Competition
episodes.overview: Sabrina is annoyed when Josh says that women can't play tennis so she gets professional and magical help. Zelda and Hilda coach Amanda for her witch's license.

episodes.name: I, Busybody
episodes.overview: After Sabrina tries to give everyone advice it seems to backfire every time.

episodes.name: Guilty!
episodes.overview: Zelda is being nominated for Professor of the year until they find out she went to college in 1873 and they fire her.

episodes.name: The Whole Ball of Wax
episodes.overview: Sabrina finds out her mysterious stalker is her mother. Once they have contact as warned she turns into a ball of wax.

episodes.name: Driving Mr. Goodman
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets into a minor car accident and the other party sues her for a fortune.

episodes.name: I Fall to Pieces
episodes.overview: Hilda finds her true love at a food court and gets married.

episodes.name: Total Sabrina Live!
episodes.overview: Morgan submits Sabrina's article to a contest and she lands a job at Scorch magazine. Zelda and Hilda move back to the Other Realm and Sabrina and friends move into their house.

episodes.name: The Big Head
episodes.overview: Sabrina's first assignment at Scorch is to interview a rock star which Sabrina ends up teaching a bit of humility.

episodes.name: Call Me Crazy
episodes.overview: First Sabrina thinks everyone considers her too young, then her babbling about herself and (oops!) magic has them thinking she's bonkers and finally an interview with Ashanti gives her some newfound respect.

episodes.name: Shift Happens
episodes.overview: Nervous about an interview with a hip-hop diva causes Sabrina to cast a spell exchanging their personalities.

episodes.name: Free Sabrina
episodes.overview: Sabrina's plan to catch a light fingered diva in the act lands Sabrina in jail.

episodes.name: Sabrina Unplugged
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets caught using her magic on Leonard's web-cam. While in his computer trying to destroy the evidence she gets an involuntary makeover and winds up looking like a cartoon siren.

episodes.name: Witch Way Out
episodes.overview: Sabrina decides to go out on a date as a mortal and entrusts her magic to Harvey. Her date only wants to put her in his zoo.

episodes.name: Bada-Ping!
episodes.overview: Sabrina sees a concert of a pop star that is being blackmailed by a gangsters. Sabrina gets threatened by the same underworld character.

episodes.name: It's a Hot, Hot, Hot, Hot Christmas
episodes.overview: The girls visit Miami for Christmas and have a run-in with Roxie's mom who gets accused of robbing their timeshare.

episodes.name: Ping, Ping A Song
episodes.overview: The girls audition for a television talent show with a bit of help from Sabrina's magic.

episodes.name: The Lyin', the Witch and the Wardrobe
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets a job for Morgan to provide clothes for a celebrity photo shoot, but in the end has to fire her.

episodes.name: In Sabrina We Trust
episodes.overview: Their house must undergo an Other Realm magical systems check without Roxie or Morgan learning about it. Finally Sabrina uses her magic on Roxie to gain her trust.

episodes.name: Sabrina in Wonderland
episodes.overview: Sabrina wants to know why she keeps running into the same guy and has to go through Wonderland before she can learn the answer.

episodes.name: Present Perfect
episodes.overview: Sabrina casts a spell to eliminate all her flaws to make herself perfect.

episodes.name: Cirque du Sabrina
episodes.overview: After Sabrina's room turns into a circus tent, she must walk up and down the tightrope until she finds a balance in life between boyfriend, friends and her job.

episodes.name: Getting To Nose You
episodes.overview: Sabrina gets tongue tied around Aaron and turns herself into a smooth talker. Her duplicate Cyrano tries to steal Aaron and Harvey confesses his love for Sabrina to Roxie and Morgan.

episodes.name: Romance Looming
episodes.overview: Sabrina makes the fates mad when she saves Morgan's life and Aaron confesses his love to Sabrina.

episodes.name: Spellmanian Slip
episodes.overview: When bickering breaks out at Sabrina's dinner with her future in-laws she casts a harmony spell and everyone breaks out in song.

episodes.name: You Slay Me
episodes.overview: After asking Cinderella for advice on her wedding, Sabrina literally turns into a monster about the preparations.

episodes.name: A Fish Tale
episodes.overview: When Aunt Irma finds out that Sabrina is marrying a mortal she turns Aaron into a fish. The episode ends with Sabrina finding Harvey's note that says that he will always love her.

episodes.name: What a Witch Wants
episodes.overview: The girls go on a bachelorette cruise into the Bermuda Triangle where witches lose their powers.

episodes.name: Soul Mates
episodes.overview: On the day of her wedding Sabrina is still trying to find whether her groom or Harvey is her real soul-mate.
